name: BestWishes
0:
”Alexa, open best wishes”
”Alexa, ask best wishes for Christmas greetings”
”Alexa, ask best wishes to give me birthday wishes”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: best wishes
des:
Currently, Christmas and birthday greetings are supported... more to come soon.

If you want to listen to the last greeting once again, say: Alexa, repeat
To hear it slowly, say: Alexa, repeat slowly
To get the next greeting, say: Alexa, next
To see the last greeting in the Alexa Companion App, say: Alexa, send to app

If you have been dropped out of the session, you can always return to the last greeting by simply opening the skill again: Alexa, open best wishes.
If you have an Echo Show, you can see the greeting on its display.

If you know a nice greeting to add, feel free to send a mail to assistful.voice@gmail.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
